title: Unable to delete FlexRep pull configuration
description:
I created a pull configuration using the UI.

When I attempt to delete the configuration I receive the following error in ErrorLog.txt. 

The configuration is not deleted.

changeHistory.comment:
I am creating several pull configurations to the same domain. 

I have multiple targets on the domain with different filter modules. 

The flexrep:pull-delete function only takes in a domain to delete the pull configuration for and therefore a sequence is not expected for a return value.

See the pull-delete function in MarkLogic/Modules/MarkLogic/flexrep.xqy
You may need to clone this bug to 4.2 as well. If the fix is simple and small, go ahead and fix on the 4.2 branch. If it's big, let's talk about it.
Cloned to 4.2, but leaving the to-be-fixed-in field blank until we decide if we actually want to fix it. I don't think there's much need to fix it in 4.2.
